title: Johnsonville Wake-Up Cups Recipe Read Reviews (1) Be the first to add a review 5 1 1
directions: Coat a 12-ounce microwave-safe coffee cup with cooking spray. Add hash browns. Microwave on high for 1 minute.
In a small bowl, combine the egg, milk, sausage and cheese; pour over hash browns. Stir until blended.
Microwave on high for 30 seconds. Stir. Microwave 30 seconds longer or until eggs are set. Serve with salsa, if desired. Yield: 1 cup
ingredients: 2 link JohnsonvilleÂ® Fully Cooked Original Recipe or Turkey Breakfast Sausage, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1/2 cup frozen shredded hash brown potatoes
